name: 7 Pillars
description: Your choices matter! Will you accept assistance from an old man, no matter how odd the request may seem? Will you kill an enemy or let them live to receive a reward they promised? Will you perform the ulitmate betrayal and hurt the ones closest to you? You decide...
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows®  7/8/8.1/10 (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR Storage: 500 MB available space
